<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>3446</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Investigating the Electrical Conductivity of Different Materials</string>
            <string language="es">Investigación de la conductividad eléctrica de diferentes materiales</string>
            <string language="ga">Seoltacht Leictreach d’Ábhair Dhifriúla a Fhiosrú</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nachforschen der elektrischen Leitfähigkeit der 
unterschiedlichen Materialien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Investigation de la conductivité électrique de 
différents matériaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Investigando o conductivity elétrico de 
materiais diferentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studio della conduttività elettrica dei 
materiali differenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα της ηλεκτρικής αγωγιμότητας των διαφορετικών 
υλικών</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Instructions for using test circuit kits to examine a variety of solids, liquids and solutions for electrical conductivity.</string>
            <string language="es">Instrucciones para la utilización de kits de circuitos para testar la conductividad eléctrica de varios sólidos, líquidos y soluciones.</string>
            <string language="ga">Treoracha chun trealamh ciorcáid tástála a úsáid chun féachaint ar éagsúlacht solaid, leachtaí agus tuaslagáin do sheoltacht leictreach.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Chemistry</string>
            <string language="es">Química. Experimento</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceimic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Experiment</string>
            <string language="ga">Turgnamh</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anwendungsvorschriften 
Teststromkreisinstallationssätze, eine Vielzahl der Körper, der 
Flüssigkeiten und der Lösungen für elektrische Leitfähigkeit zu 
überprüfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Instructions pour que les kits de circuit d'essai
d'utilisation examinent une variété de solides, de liquides et de 
solutions pour la conductivité électrique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instruções para que os jogos usando-se do 
circuito do teste examinem uma variedade dos sólidos, dos líquidos e
das soluções para o conductivity elétrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Istruzioni affinchè kit del circuito della prova
usando esaminino una varietà di solidi, di liquidi e di soluzioni per
conduttività elettrica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδηγίες για τη χρησιμοποίηση των εξαρτήσεων κυκλωμάτων
δοκιμής για να εξετάσει ποικίλες στερεά, υγρά και λύσεις για την
ηλεκτρική αγωγιμότητα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chimie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérience</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chimica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημεία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πείραμα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
